epidemicProtocol.control

Class TargetsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • epidemicProtocol.control.TargetsList

  • public class TargetsList
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure that store a list of local computers addresses. These address are found with the broadcast messages (sent with BroadcastClient) received in TargetsListServer. This list is used to spread the messages received in the SpreadServer.

        public TargetsList(javax.swing.JTextArea output)

    • Method Detail

      • tryToAdd

        public boolean tryToAdd(java.lang.String address)
        Try to add a address in the addressesList. If the address being added is equal to the localHost address, it don't need to be added.
        Parameters:
        address - Some address to be added to the addressesList.
        Returns:
        True if the address was added to the addressesList successfully.

      • tryToRemove

        public boolean tryToRemove(java.lang.String address)
        Try to remove the address passed in the param from the addressesList.
        Parameters:
        address - address to be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the address was removed successfully.

      • getOneAddress

        public java.lang.String getOneAddress()
        Return one String address. It uses the auxCount attribute to make a circular rotation with the addresses stored.
        Returns:
        One of the addresses of the addressList attribute.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
